content.text: Hello there! What do you like to do for fun?
Hello! I love to create music in my studio. It's my happy place.
That sounds really cool! I wish I could play an instrument.
I'm sure you could do it if you put your mind to it!
Thanks! I'm also trying to open my own grocery store.
That's really ambitious! Good luck with that!
Thanks! I'm going to need all the luck I can get.
I'm sure you'll do great. What kind of music do you like to create?
I mostly create electronic music. I like to make music that people can dance to.
That sounds really cool! I'm not much of a dancer myself, but I love listening to electronic music.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
Do you ever play your music at any of the pride parades?
I haven't yet, but I'd love to!
You should definitely do it! I'm sure people would love it.
